content.text: Simplify \(5t + 4t - 2t\)
The lowest temperature recorded at Scott Base in Antarctica is \(- 57.0^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\)
The highest temperature recorded at Scott Base is \(63.8^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\) more than this
What is the highest temperature recorded at Scott Base?
Measure the bearing of \(B\) from \(A\)
Find the value of
Matt takes a red ball,
Matt does **not** take a blue ball
A bag contains 3 green balls, 4 red balls and 1 blue ball only
Matt takes a ball from the bag at random
Some probabilities are marked on the probability scale
Write down the letter that shows the probability that
Sara stops at a shop on her way to school
Find the distance of the shop from her home
School starts at 08 55
Find the number of minutes between the time Sara arrives at school and the time school starts
Sara walks from home to school
The travel graph shows her journey
Write these in order of size, starting with the smallest
smallest
The table shows how children in Ivan's class travel to school
Ivan wants to draw a pie chart to show this information
Find the sector angle for children who walk to school
Rashid changes 30 000 rupees to dollars when the exchange rate is \(\$ 1 = 68.14\) rupees
How many dollars does he receive?
Complete the statements
Kiran leaves home at 9.45 am
She drives \(135\mathrm{km}\) to visit a friend
She arrives at her friend's house at 11.15 am
Work out her average speed in km/h
The scatter diagram shows the age and value of each of ten cars, all of the same model
By drawing a line of best fit, estimate the value of a car that is 6 years old
Find the value of
Shade two more small squares to give a pattern with exactly one line of symmetry
Complete the description of this pattern
The pattern has ................. lines of symmetry
and order of rotational symmetry
Write down the mode
Calculate the mean
These are the number of texts sent one day by each of 10 students
The diagram shows a cuboid measuring \(15\mathrm{cm}\) by \(12\mathrm{cm}\) by \(4\mathrm{cm}\)
Calculate the surface area of the cuboid
Without using a calculator, work out \(3\frac{5}{8} - 1\frac{2}{3}\)
You must show all your working and give your answer as a mixed number in its simplest form
Javier invests \(750 for 3 years at a rate of \(1.8\%\) per year compound interest
Calculate the value of his investment at the end of the 3 years
The diagram shows a right-angled triangle
Calculate the value of \(x\)
Find the gradient of the line \(L\)
Find the equation of the line \(L\) in the form \(y = mx + c\)
The line \(L\) is shown on the grid
Quadrilateral ............... is a rhombus
Quadrilateral \(A\) is a
Quadrilaterals ............... and ................ are congruent
Quadrilaterals ............... and ................ are similar
The diagram shows some quadrilaterals
Complete the statements
Write down an expression, in terms of \(x\) and \(y\), for the total cost, in dollars, of the magazines and the cards
Esme spends $60.55 in total
She buys 8 magazines
How many cards does she buy?
Esme buys \(x\) magazines at \(\mathbb{S}2.45\) each and \(y\) cards at \(\mathbb{S}3.15\) each
The diagram shows a scale drawing of Lei's garden, \(PQRS.\)
The scale is 1 centimetre represents 2 metres
Scale: 1 cm to 2 m
Lei has a bird table in the garden that is
equidistant from \(PQ\) and \(QR\)
and
\(13 \text{m}\) from \(R\)
On the diagram, construct the position of the bird table
Use a ruler and compasses only and show all your construction arcs
